name: Blue Tansy Leave in Conditioning Styler
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:A blue-tansy-based daily leave-in conditioner that preps, strengthens, and repairs dry or color-treated hair..Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Texture:Curly and Coily.Hair Concerns:.Key Benefits:- Strengthens damaged hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Blue-Tansy Oil: Fights against premature aging of the scalp..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This blue-tansy leave-in conditioning styler is a daily treatment to repair damage from color or daily stressors. It is formulated with bamboo extract, hydrolyzed quinoa, and sea kelp extract, which work in unison to reduce shedding, build elasticity, and strengthen hair..Fragrance Description:This styler contains floral notes of natural tuberose, jasmine bud extract, ylang-ylang, orris concrete, benzoin, and musks..
ingredients: -Blue-Tansy Oil: Fights against premature aging of the scalp..-Bamboo Extract: Adds shine to lackluster hair..-Slippery Elm: Reduces tangling...Water (Aqua), Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil, Bamboo Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Macrocystis pyrifera (Sea Kelp) extract, Ulmus rubra (slippery Elm) Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Fragrance, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply the blue-tansy leave-in conditioning styler on wet, damp, or dry hair..-Rake this product through with your fingers until it dissolves.                                                                                                                                 -Depending on your desired look, follow up with your adwoa beauty styler of choice.                                                                                        -This product can also be used daily for an added protein boost.                                                                                                                              -For wavy or curly hair textures, this product may be used alone for your wash u2019nu2019 go.

reviews.review_text: this blue tansy leave-in is great! it has a thick, rich consistency which is great for my 4b, coily hair. my test for product effectiveness is how it holds up under my wash and go using a gel. i washed and deep conditioned my hair. then, on wet hair i applied this product in sections, making sure to coat every strand. i then applied my eco gel and sat under the hooded dryer for an hour, upon coming out of the dryer, my hair was nice and firm from the gel but you could still feel the moisture underneath it all. that is how i know this is a great leave-in. i still felt great moisture even under a hard-holding gel. another test is that the moisture was still there the next day. in fact, the moisture lasted a whole week! to sum it up, i would highly recommend this leave-in, especially if you are looking for a balance of both hair strengthening and extreme moisture. it will be a staple for me so i will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't really work with my hair and routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, 2C wavy hair that is currently jaw-length and my roots need to be re-done but it is lifted from a level 2/3 to a level 9 and dyed green.  I normally use a rinse-out color-enhancing conditioner, Pureology's Color Fanatic leave-in spray conditioner, a curl cream on wet hair and then break the scrunched cast with La'dor Wonder Hair Oil.  In the past I have used the regular Bumble & Bumble's 3-in-1 Curl Conditioner as a leave-in/styler and I liked that much better than this as it wasn't as heavy by volume.  What I mean by that is even with my hair being shorter right now I still have a lot of it because it is so thick (even with an undercut I have a ton of hair) so I need a certain amount of conditioner just to make sure all my hair gets some of it.    With this product it is really thick for a leave-in, and the texture is like my defining cream, but it is conditioner?  So I wasn't sure exactly what to do - I use a chickpea-sized amount of curl cream but it goes through my hair like butter because it has already been conditioned.  I needed much more of this because it IS the conditioner.  Still I didn't use nearly a full pump because of how afraid I was due to the heavy ingredients.  I didn't add anything else and just scrunched and air dried as I never use heat and I have crunchy straight bits higher up on my head where my curl pattern should start and the bottom half looks like beachy 2A waves as opposed to tight 2C waves.  I will try again following some other reviewers suggestions by using less product, adding water, and making an emulsion to thin it out first.  If that doesn't help, I will try it like a regular wash-out conditioner.  If that doesn't cut it then I might return it.  It's a decent product but definitely not intended for air-drying or to replace all the others you use like some sort of magic cream in a bottle.  I'm not going to make any recommendations against it as everyone has their own hair and routines.

I tried this and defused my hair and the curls have never looked so good! It made my hair not as frizzy and more defined. Also didnu2019t weight it down or make it crunchy, and it smells good! Will be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly love how my curls spring back to life with this leave in conditioner Since Iu2019ve been using it my hair has been so much healthier and the smell alone is so amazing I canu2019t get it enough itu2019s a must have for your hair needs!

reviews.review_text: It makes my hair smell weird when itu2019s first appliedu2026 the smell goes away. Does that happen to anyone else? It does make my hair feel good. I have thick Hawaiian hair

reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product. I was having trouble taking care of my wavy hair and most curl/wave products didnu2019t work for me or they were too heavy. This makes me hair feel and look amazing and brings my waves out without feeling like I have a lot of product in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with the other reviewer that itu2019s not ideal for straight or fine hair, as mentioned in its preferred hair types. It weighed my hair down a lot! I think someone with curly hair would love though, as itu2019s really thick and hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long hair and I have a problem with tangles! After I started using this leave in conditioner my hair has be so much easier to brush through! The smell is a nice light clean smell! I absolutely love it and itu2019s a must have for my morning routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!!  This stuff makes my hair super soft, the softest my hair has ever been I have tried the shampoo and it didnu2019t work well with my hair so I had to return it but otherwise If you are interested in purchasing anything from the Blue Tansy line I highly highly recommend this product  Super thick, the best way I find to use this product is straight out of the shower apply this product to your damp hair, then comb your hair and blow dry as normal Love love love will continue to repurchase this Bought with my own money too did not receive this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Blue Tansy shampoo, reparative conditioner, reparative mask, and the serum in early August. The products are subpar especially for this price point. My hair definitely needs more than one pump of the serum.  Since the pump was broken and they refused to send me another pump, I purchased my own container with a working pump so, I could actually use the product. I really expected a lot more from this product line considering how much I like the baomint moisturizing curl defining gel. However, I was disappointed to say the least. I waited to give my feedback after I used the products awhile. However, my hair is lackluster and hard. Once I switched to different products and conditioner my hair is back to feeling soft and having a sheen/luster that does not feel weighed down. Save your money and please thoroughly do your research. Direct customer service with Adwoa was unpleasant to say the least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will say that I am surprised of how much I like this product, really Iu2019ve tried a lot and this one is great if I keep my hair natural however the packaging is bad, the pump came semi broken and it broken within 2 weeks, another product from this line too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I'm one of the crazy curly-haired people - because I bleach my hair platinum blonde. I have 2c/3a curls and caucasian hair. It's short but fairly thick and quite wild without any product (super soft, but chaotic). I get a scary good Doc Brown vibe going if I just wash and conditioner.  I've tried Adwoa's Baomint mask and leave-in before this and loved them both, but I vastly prefer the Blue Tansy leave-in to the Baomint one. My hair loves protein and the bleaching means I need it even more. it's thick and creamy and gives a lot slip (my conditioner does too but this just doubles down on it). It smells heavenly and I don't have to use a lot of it for my hair to be covered.  I usually use this first after washing and conditioning (I use Olaplex 4P and 5) and layer other products over it. I feel like it performs best as a base product rather than over anything else. My hair is always very soft, shiny, and has lot of life when I use this and it isn't super heavy. It smooths and helps keep my curls clumped but doesn't weigh any of my hair down.  Adwoa's entire line of products are wonderful but I think the Blue Tansy line is going to be the standout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: left my hair very soft and manageable.  Would buy again

reviews.review_title: Will buy again and again and AGAIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair feel so fluffy and soft yet curly and STRONG!! Love the healthy ingredients too. How did Adwoa Beauty do that?? Will always be in my hair stash, I love it so much!!!   P.S., Dear Sephora Team, please l always sell Adwoa Beauty products, THANK YOU!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been natural for 5years, this is the BEST leave in I've tried so far. Detangle, leaves my hair soft and manageable. I was ready to slap that creamy crack back in because wash days was just too darn much, time consuming and the tangles drove me to tears. So happy Luna(sales associate) recommended this for me. I have 4b/4c hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great leave in. I use it with the serum for a great blow out and my hair is shiny, soft, and smooth. I have naturally curly hair!

reviews.review_title: Great for low porosity hair as well
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Moisturized my hair after applying. Made my hair soft and manageable. Iu2019m low porosity and the leave in conditioner did not throw off my moisture/protein balance. Iu2019ve been using the boa mint leave in for years but I actually prefer this one. I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not have damaged hair but this leave in has done what others could not do.  For the first time in many years I have finally found a leave in that leaves my hair so fluffy and curly.  I have a short fro and one pump goes a long way.  I can actually use less since my hair is short.  I can finger comb my hair with ease and leave it alone.  I do not seal with an oil or use a cream and my hair stays moisturized for a week.  I do not know what type of sorcery Adwoa has been dealing in but these products have me shook.  If you have had problems with finding products that don't weigh your hair down or leave it dry and limpless give these a try.  I really think you will be impressed.

Love this leave in conditioner. Itu2019s a light floral scent which isnu2019t overbearing as well. If you didnu2019t like the scent of the baomint collection, i think youu2019d be pleasantly surprised. It moisturized my hair on contact and i noticed a lot of shine as well. My hair is soft and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this leave-in! Itu2019s moisturizing but offers a slight hold at the same time. Iu2019m also impressed by how long the moisture last, I usually have to reapply products, itu2019s been 3 days and my hair is still moisturizes, shiny and bouncy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute BEST leave in EVER! I was never a fan of leave ins simply because they seemed to do nothing, so Iu2019d skip the step. Bought this entire set and since this is the styler, gave it a try on my daughter and WOW! Itu2019s amazing. Her hair is super moisturizing, shiny and defined! So defined that I think Iu2019ll attempt a wash and go with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have 4C low porosity and I was throughly impressed with the product. I used the shampoo, deep conditioner, then follow up with the leave in. I used the leave in as preparation to blow dry my hair. My hair asorbed the product well, detangling made easy, and made my hair feel soft post blow dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product and every other product under the blue tansy line has worked magic for my hair. The smell is what I have always imagined clouds would smell like. The feel, moisture, and strength provided to my hair has been amazing. I had a lot of postpartum shedding and the added boost of protein has done magical things to my hair. These products are nothing short of amazing.    Iu2019ve used this on myself and my daughter. We have different hair types and the results havenu2019t changed. Itu2019s a MUST for anyone!!

reviews.review_text: Good product just didnu2019t like the smell but I totally recommend!

reviews.review_text: This leave in is amazing!!! I think i finslly found my holy grail leave in. I have 4a/4b low porosity coils. The slip is awesome, the moisture is great!. It foest just sit on top of your hair. This worked very well with a gel on top for an amazing wash and go. I will be purchasing this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This styler is soo great! It surprised me that my hair stayed moisturized way past my regular wash day. Typically my hair would need another styler/ cream/gel. This is really a one and done! I will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg! Best product! Leaves my hair super moisturized and soft. I love pairing it with the gel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m only writing this review because I saw someone say this canu2019t be for straight hair. Maybe if your hair isnu2019t damaged.. but if you hair has a hard time holding moisture this is an absolute god send. I have crispy fried bleached hair (I bleached it 6 times in the span of two weeks like an idiot) I went platinum from pitch black dye. My hair is as soft as itu2019s ever been. Donu2019t let the iffy review throw you off this stuff is amazing Iu2019m so glad I tried this. For reference Iu2019ve tried the quai leave in the bumble oil, gisou oil, playa oil and literally so many more. My hair is so soft as if I never even bleached it Iu2019m taking this product to the grave with me lol. Their oil is amazing too I use that once in the morning and once at night on non wash days and it keeps my hair hydrated. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect follow up after a deep treatment. My curls were already popping the the blue tansy deep conditioner but the leave in added an extra hydration to my curls and you don't need a lot to get the job done. This leave in is great for maintain that protein/moisture balance to the hair in between wash days. Amazing ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is amazing! the touch is sooo soft. i love this product, but sadly it is not for all hair types. this is better for coily hair and not for straight hair. it made my hair look super greasy and heavy. i let my friend used it and her curls were bouncy and shiny! again this is for coily hair only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the slip and moisture from this leave-in.  I have 4a-4c curly kinky hair that is so thirsty! This leave-in worked well.  It was not heavy enough for me to use as a styler for a wash-n-go, so I used the Adwoa Baomint gel on top. I was left with pretty defined hair that smells incredible.  Some slight frizz in parts, but I think that was due to user error.  These products should definitely be applied to dripping wet hair. The sections of my hair that were a little drier had more frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: How is is possible to have a leave in and curl cream!!! My twist out looks amazing. My hair truly enjoyed this. Itu2019s very thick and my curls drank this right up. This doesnu2019t compare to the other leave in they offer, itu2019s much thicker and great for styling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Blue Tansy Leave-In Conditioner Blew Me Away! I usually don't apply a leave-in conditioner before straightening my natural hair, but this is a game-changer. After rinsing out the Blue Tansy Reparative Mask, I used the Blue Tansy Leave-in Conditioner and proceeded to blow dry my hair. As a result, my hair felt soft and moisturized. In addition, the Blue Tansy Leave-In Conditioner did not weigh my hair down, and the fragrance is perfect.  If you straighten your hair, I highly recommend this product.
